document.full_text: charlie sheen on tuesday added five new shows to the schedule of live performances he has mounted in the wake of being fired last week from his hit television program "two and a half men."
document.title: charlie sheen adds five cities to national tour
lines_and_colors: charlie sheen on tuesday added five new shows to the schedule of live performances he has mounted in the wake of being fired last week from his hit television program "two and a half men."
